name: Ball & Chain (jimmyc5)
description:
Ball & Chain is a short puzzle platformer about a square that's stuck to a ball via a chain. You'll have to carefully maneuver both yourself and your ball and chain around each level to beat the game, with a bit of problem solving on the way. Have fun!

You can move using the WASD keys. Press R to restart a level if you get stuck, and press M to mute or unmute the music.
